165_63_15_16_2.name: Equipment Status
165_63_15_16_2.desc: Reflects the current state of circuits, features, bodies, and equipment attached to the OCP.

payload.name: Panel Time
payload.desc: Current time hours reported from the OCP.

payload.name: Panel Time
payload.desc: Current time minutes reported from the OCP.

payload.name: Circuit States
payload.desc: Bit flags for up to 40 aux circuits

payload.name: Feature States
payload.desc: Upper 4 bits contain the first 4 feature states.  Lower 4 bits are undefined.

165_63_15_16_168.name: Set Config Item
165_63_15_16_168.desc: Set a configuration item on the OCP

0_0.name: Set Options Config
0_0.desc: Request to set the options configuration.

3_0.name: Config Options
3_0.desc: Request to set the configuration options

payload.name: Config Category
payload.desc: The configuration category for the item.

payload.name: Category Item
payload.desc: The underlying item requested from the OCP

0_0.name: Request Advanced Options
0_0.desc: Request the options from the server

payload.name: Config Category Options
payload.desc: When set to 0 the options will be requested from the server

values.0: Identifies this as a request for options settings.

payload.name: Advanced options
payload.desc: Signifies that we are requesting the advanced options from the server

values.0: The configuration item is advanced options.

0_1.name: Request Options Extension
0_1.desc: Requests the unknown extension from the server

payload.name: Config Category Options
payload.desc: When set to 0 the options will be requested from the server

values.0: Identifies this as a request for options settings.

payload.name: Advanced options
payload.desc: Signifies that we are requesting the advanced options from the server

values.1: The configuration item is extended options

payload.name: Response Key
payload.desc: Identifies the mesaage as containing the advanced options data.

payload.name: Water Sensor #2 Adjustment
payload.desc: When bit 8 is set then this is a negative value.

payload.name: Water Sensor #1 Adjustment
payload.desc: When bit 8 is set then this is a negative value.

payload.name: Solar Sensor #1 Adjustment
payload.desc: When bit 8 is set then this is a negative value.

payload.name: Solar Sensor #1 Adjustment
payload.desc: When bit 8 is set then this is a negative value.

payload.name: Air Sensor Adjustment
payload.desc: When bit 8 is set then this is a negative value.

payload.name: Solar Sensor #2 Adjustment
payload.desc: When bit 8 is set then this is a negative value.

payload.name: Time Settings
payload.desc: The time settings on the OCP.

payload.name: Body #1 Setpoint
payload.desc: The heat setpoint for the first body.

payload.name: Body #3 Setpoint
payload.desc: The heat setpoint for the third body.

payload.name: Body #2 Setpoint
payload.desc: The heat setpoint for the first body.

payload.name: Body #4 Setpoint
payload.desc: The heat setpoint for the fourth body.

payload.name: Body #1 Heat Mode
payload.desc: The heat mode for the first body.

payload.name: Body #2 Heat Mode
payload.desc: The heat mode for the second body.

payload.name: Body #3 Heat Mode
payload.desc: The heat mode for the third body.

payload.name: Body #4 Heat Mode
payload.desc: The heat mode for the fourth body.

payload.name: Pump Delay
payload.desc: Indicates what option will be chosen when valve

values.1: On - Pump off during valve action

payload.name: Heater Cooldown
payload.desc: Heater cooldown delay that controls what action the pump should perform during a cooldown cycle.

payload.name: Manual Op Priority
payload.desc: Manual operations override scheduled operation.

payload.name: Manual Heat
payload.desc: Manual heat for spa operation

0_1.name: Config Options
0_1.desc: Response to the configuration options request

165_P_16_V_82.name: Ping OCP for an address
165_P_16_V_82.desc: The valve will ping the OCP for an address when it is on the bus.

16_3_0.name: Set Chlorinator Control
16_3_0.desc: Sets the chlorinator control to the OCP.  This message is required to maintain the control of the chlorinator.

16_3_1.name: Control Acknowlegement
16_3_1.desc: Indicates that the chlorinator is now being controlled by the OCP.

16_3_3.name: Control Acknowlegement
16_3_3.desc: Indicates that the chlorinator is now being controlled by the OCP.

16_3_17.name: Set the output on the chlorinator
16_3_17.desc: Sets the chlorinator's output based upon the values in the payload

16_3_18.name: Status Response
16_3_18.desc: Response from the chloriator indicating the current status an salt level.

16_3_20.name: Get chlorinator model
16_3_20.desc: Request from the OCP to get the model of the chlorinator.

165_P_P_16_1.name: Set pump drive speed and flow
165_P_P_16_1.desc: Sets the rpm and/or flow of the pump.  This message is sent to take control of the pump and disable the local control panel on the drive.

165_P_16_P_1.name: Response to setting the speed or flow.
165_P_16_P_1.desc: This message is in response to the pump speed or flow being set.

165_P_P_16_4.name: Set pump run state
165_P_P_16_4.desc: Sets the run state pf the pump.  This message is sent to take control of the pump and disable the local control panel on the drive.

165_P_16_P_4.name: Response to setting the run state.
165_P_16_P_4.desc: This message is in response to the pump run state being set.  A return of 255 indicates that the local control panel on the drive has been disabled.

165_P_P_16_6.name: Set pump drive state
165_P_P_16_6.desc: Sets the run state pf the pump.  This message is sent to take control of the pump and disable the local control panel on the drive.

165_P_16_P_6.name: Response to setting the drive state.
165_P_16_P_6.desc: This message is in response to the pump drive state being set.

165_P_P_16_7.name: Get pump status
165_P_P_16_7.desc: Broadcast request to get the current running status of the pump.

165_P_16_P_7.name: Pump status response
165_P_16_P_7.desc: Broadcast request to get the current running status of the pump.
